attributes.action: Withdraw Support for banning Incandescent lightbubs until Energy efficient bulbs become light efficient.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present Energy efficient, electric light bulbs take time to reach peak light performance. Therefore people using them leave them on when making infrequent visits into a room. A normal light bulb is at full brightness, within seconds of switching on. Imagine having to wait five minutes before light was sufficent enough for you to find your shoes, in the cupboard, under the stairs? More recent designs are faster acting, however it is necessary to use a combination at present.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
